metadata.title: Hoodiz Tunisia - Premium Hoodies & Streetwear
metadata.description: Premium hoodies and streetwear from Tunisia. Discover unique designs across anime, gaming, and urban styles. Quality clothing delivered across Tunisia.

shipping.question: What is your shipping policy?
shipping.answer: We offer free shipping . Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in their original packaging. Custom orders are final sale.

care.question: How should I care for my hoodie?
care.answer: Machine wash cold with similar colors. Tumble dry on low heat or hang to dry. Do not bleach or iron directly on the print. For best results, wash inside out.

durability.question: Are the prints durable?
durability.answer: Yes! Our high-quality vinyl prints are designed to last through many washes without cracking or fading. We use premium materials and heat-transfer techniques for long-lasting results.

quality.title: Crafted for Excellence
quality.subtitle: Every hoodie is made with meticulous attention to detail

fabric.title: Premium Fabric
fabric.description: 320gsm heavy-weight cotton blend for ultimate comfort and durability

print.title: HD Print Technology
print.description: Vibrant, long-lasting prints that won't crack, peel, or fade

stitching.title: Reinforced Stitching
stitching.description: Double-stitched seams for extra durability and a premium finish

fit.title: Perfect Fit
fit.description: Pre-shrunk fabric with a comfortable, true-to-size fit

shipping.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 days) is available at checkout.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for unworn, unwashed items with tags attached. Returns are free!

tracking.question: How do I track my order?
tracking.answer: Once your order ships, you will receive an email  .

changeOrder.question: Can I change my order after placing it?
changeOrder.answer: Contact us within 1 hour of placing your order to make changes.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.description: We create premium hoodies made for comfort, durability, and style — inspired by street culture, creativity, and the lifestyle of a new Tunisian generation.

mission.title: Expressing Identity Through Fashion
mission.paragraph1: Our mission is to design high-quality hoodies that fit every style and every moment. From minimal designs to bold statements, our pieces are made for people who want to express who they are through what they wear.
mission.paragraph2: Each hoodie is crafted using premium materials, attention to detail, and modern design standards — adapted to local tastes, daily wear, and long-lasting comfort.

authenticDesigns.title: Authentic Design
authenticDesigns.description: Every hoodie is designed with intention — combining creativity, simplicity, and originality.

premiumQuality.title: Premium Quality
premiumQuality.description: We use high-quality fabrics to ensure softness, durability, and a perfect fit for everyday wear.

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.description: We proudly support the Tunisian creative and streetwear community, building something local with global standards.

fastDelivery.title: Fast & Reliable Delivery
fastDelivery.description: Efficient delivery across Tunisia, with responsive support and careful packaging.

cta.title: Ready to Join HOODIZ ?
cta.description: Discover our collection of premium anime hoodies and find the perfect piece to express your fandom.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

1.title: Introduction
1.content: Hoodie Legends ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and make purchases from us. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site. This policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

2.title: Data We Collect
2.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including: name, email address, shipping address, billing address, phone number, and payment information. We also automatically collect certain information when you visit our site, including: IP address, browser type, device information, and browsing behavior.

3.title: How We Use Your Data
3.content: We use the information we collect to: process and fulfill your orders, communicate with you about your orders, send promotional emails (with your consent), improve our website and services, prevent fraud and enhance security, and comply with legal obligations.

4.title: Cookies & Tracking
4.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are files with small amounts of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

5.title: Data Sharing
5.content: We may share your information with: service providers who assist us in operating our website, payment processors, shipping carriers, and legal authorities when required by law. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

6.title: Your Rights
6.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to: access your personal data, rectify inaccurate data, erase your data, restrict processing, data portability, and object to processing. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

7.title: Data Security
7.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

8.title: Children's Privacy
8.content: Our website is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information.

9.title: Policy Changes
9.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

10.title: Contact Us
10.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information below.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

useOfServices.title: 2. Use of Services
useOfServices.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms and Conditions.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for safeguarding your password and for all activities that occur under your account.

privacyPolicy.title: 4. Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: Your use of our services is also governed by our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in our Privacy Policy.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of this website are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

limitationOfLiability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the services.

changesToTerms.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contactInformation.title: 8. Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

gdpr.exportDescription: Download a copy of your personal data.
gdpr.deleteDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
gdpr.confirmDelete: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.

export.title: Export Your Data

export.success: Your data has been exported and downloaded successfully.
export.error: Failed to export data. Please try again.
export.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
export.footer: This request is processed automatically. For manual assistance, {link}.

delete.title: Delete Your Account
delete.description: Request permanent deletion of your personal data.

warningItems.permanent: This action is permanent and cannot be undone
warningItems.orders: All your order history will be deleted
warningItems.wishlist: Your wishlist items will be removed
warningItems.access: You will lose access to your account immediately
warningItems.pending: If you have pending orders, please contact support first

delete.confirmError: Please type "delete my account" to confirm.
delete.success: Your account deletion request has been received. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
delete.error: Failed to process deletion request. Please try again.
delete.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
delete.gdprNotice: This request is processed in accordance with {link} (Right to Erasure). We will confirm your deletion request via email within 24 hours.

errors.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.description: You do not have permission to access this page. This area is restricted to administrators only.
unauthorized.contactSupport: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.

blocked.title: Account Blocked
blocked.description: Your account has been restricted. You cannot access this site.
blocked.contactMistake: If you believe this is a mistake, please contact our support team.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic.
cookieConsent.necessaryDescription: These cookies are required for the website to function properly.
cookieConsent.analyticsDescription: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookieConsent.marketingDescription: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites for advertising purposes.
